author: Silvena Rowe
method: Cut greaseproof paper into circles the size of the opening on the jam jars. Place all the ingredients in a pan with 150ml/5fl oz water and simmer until the rhubarb starts to soften. Remove the vanilla pod.   Pour the hot jam into sterilised jam jars and cover the jam with the greaseproof paper circles. Screw on the lids and set aside to cool completely.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz rhubarb, chopped into small pieces,  2 vanilla pods,  1kg/2lb 4oz preserving sugar,  4-5 tbsp apple pectin (available from large supermarkets and health food shops)
